text: Brickellia coixtlahuaca is a Mexican species of flowering plants in the daisy family. It is native to the State of Oaxaca in southwestern Mexico.Turner, B. L. (2010). Two new species of Brickellia (Asteraceae: Eupatorieae) from Oaxaca, Mexico, in the Coixtlahuaca District, Concepcion, Buena Vista. Phytologia 92:1-15.The International Plant Names Index ==References== coixtlahuaca Category:Flora of Oaxaca Category:Plants described in 2010
title: Brickellia coixtlahuaca
